item.title: Getting started with android-edittext
item.description: Specifying Text Hints # It is possible to specify a text hint when using EditTexts. Text hints are useful for conveying to the user what they should type in the EditText. In XML: <EditText android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:hint="username" /> The content of the hint (in our example, ‘username’) can be anything you like.
